messages.subject: (x-post) Fanfic Contest--It's all about Itou
messages.msgSnippet: If Itou Kashitarou had a son..... What would he be like? That s the thing I wondered when we began our A/U rpg Far Frontier and that ended up spawning a series
messages.messageBody:
If Itou Kashitarou had a son.....

What would he be like? That's the thing I wondered when we began our
A/U rpg Far Frontier and that ended up spawning a series of original
yaoi novels co written with my friend & rp partner in crime Anne Cain.

And since our "bad bad boy" Toshiro Itou is very much his "father's"
son, we thought we'd do a fanfic contest featuring daddy Itou. ^_^

It can be fluffy or angsty, het or slash, sweet or sexy. ^_^

Your Itou/other character(s) can be from any universe the Shinsengumi
are in NHK/RK/PMK/ Assorted Movies.

The length should be 1,000혰1,500 words

The deadline혰let's make it easy to remember혰July 4, 2006

The prize혰oh yes there is a prize A copy of The Dragon's Disciple the
new illustrated yaoi novel featuring the fictional Toshiro Itou by
Barbara Sheridan and Anne Cain .

You can check out the info on that at http://www.dragonsdisciple.com

Entries can be emailed to:

toshiro(AT)dragonsdisciple.com

--Barb Sheridan
*Itou fangirl*
